articles.title: The new zones + hiatus
articles.description: Hello! After the release of ShapeWorld: FightLand, the development of the game has been pretty slow but here we are to show you the new zone: Winter.

articles.title: ShapeWorld: FightLand - Version 1.0.0
articles.description: Hello! After one year of development, ShapeWorld: FightLand has been finally released as an Early Access! The development of this game was pretty complicated but we managed to create our best game at this moment
